lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Romance in the Beauty Pageant

sentence.idiomatic: Lately your performance is not that great.
Last night you did very well on the stage.
I really admire your performance in the match.
Amongst these people, I am most impressed by you.
Before the competition, everyone had the most hopes set on her. But yesterday she didn't do very well.
He is most impressed by that black horse; it looks quite strong.
I totally believe you.
You absolutely have the ability to complete this.
The food you make is absolutely delicious.
She is coming to Shanghai next week to promote her new book.
The work done to promote the new product was done very well.
If you sell it to me a little cheaper, I will promote you to my friends.
This girl is really special--she really has her own opinions.
I think he is a very opinionated person.
You should have your own opinions. You can't always listen to others'.
You are so naive--you are easily fooled by others.
Your viewpoint is too naive.
I like a more simple kind of girl.
If you don't have money, you can't survive for even one day.
It's survival of the fittest. Only if you adapt to this society will you be able to survive.
In the big city, if you're not on the ball it's difficult to survive.
I want to thank my family for the encouragement and support they have given me.
He encouraged me to take part in the competition.
Parents should constantly encourage their children, rather than scold them.
The instant they met they got along superbly.
On the weekends, he often goes out to drink and chat with some friends that he gets along well with.
His personality is very cheerful; he gets along well with everyone.
Miss Liu, you are doing better and better.
Thank you! May I ask your last name?
I'm Zhou Peng. My company is the sponsor for this competition. I'm impressed by you.
Thank you, Mr. Zhou.
Ah, don't call me that. It makes me sound old.
That was totally not what I meant.
Why did you decide to be in the beauty pageant?
It was mostly to promote my blog. But I never imagined that the main thing in this pageant is beauty, not blogs.
You have your opinions, and you're very naive. You're not like the other girls.
But it's hard to survive as I am.
Says who? Being yourself is what's most important.
Thank you for your encouragement. I haven't heard that kind of talk in a while.
Liu Jia, are you free tomorrow night? Let's have dinner together.
Ummm...
Don't be afraid. I'm not a playboy. I think we get along well. Plus I want to know more about your blog.
Well, OK.
